abilities.name: Le Parfum
abilities.text: When you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon, you may search your deck for any card and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Squeeze
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage and the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.
